movies.name: Inception
movies.description: A skilled thief is given a chance at redemption if he can successfully perform an inception.

movies.name: The Dark Knight
movies.description: Batman must fight the Joker, a criminal mastermind who wants to plunge Gotham City into chaos.

movies.name: Interstellar
movies.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.name: Avengers: Endgame
movies.description: The Avengers assemble once more to reverse the damage caused by Thanos and restore the universe.

movies.name: The Matrix
movies.description: A hacker discovers the world he lives in is a simulated reality controlled by machines.

movies.name: Titanic
movies.description: A love story unfolds aboard the ill-fated RMS Titanic.

movies.name: Gladiator
movies.description: A former Roman General seeks revenge after being betrayed and his family murdered.

movies.name: Jurassic Park
movies.description: A theme park full of cloned dinosaurs becomes a nightmare when the creatures escape.

movies.name: Forrest Gump
movies.description: The extraordinary life journey of Forrest Gump, a man with a kind heart and low IQ.

movies.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
movies.description: A hobbit sets out on a journey to destroy the One Ring and save Middle-earth.

movies.name: Avatar
movies.description: A paraplegic marine is sent to the alien world of Pandora on a unique mission.

movies.name: The Godfather
movies.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control to his reluctant son.

movies.name: Pulp Fiction
movies.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in a series of tales.

movies.name: Shutter Island
movies.description: A U.S. Marshal investigates a psychiatric facility on an isolated island after a patient goes missing.

movies.name: The Lion King
movies.description: A young lion prince flees his kingdom after the murder of his father, only to learn the true meaning of responsibility and bravery.

movies.name: Frozen
movies.description: Princess Anna sets out on a journey to save her kingdom from eternal winter.

movies.name: The Avengers
movies.description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together to stop Loki and his alien army.

movies.name: Spider-Man: No Way Home
movies.description: Peter Parker faces multiverse villains and the consequences of revealing his identity.

movies.name: Guardians of the Galaxy
movies.description: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior from taking control of the universe.
